original_text: Another time, Jesus went into the Jewish meeting place. A man was there. His hand was very small and weak, so he could not use it.
korean_text: 예수께서 다시 회당에 들어가시니 한쪽 손 마른 사람이 거기 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Jesus went into the Jewish meeting place
His hand was very small and weak
so he could not use it
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그것을 사용할 수 없었다
